title: Noam Chomsky
description:
Noam Chomsky is a prominent American linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, and social critic. Born on December 7, 1928, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, he is widely regarded as one of the most influential intellectuals of the 20th century. Chomsky's work has had a significant impact on various fields, including linguistics, psychology, philosophy, politics, and the study of media.
